channel.title: PK AREAS/Safe Zones/Runserver error/Playerlist
channel.description: i was wondering how to add safe areas, how to add pk areas, how to add pk point system, how to make a command that makes a list of palyers that are on, and i get this error sometimes wen people log on like this [code]Client type: low memory version UserId: 43057511 ruffggerrrs has signed onto server. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13224) at client.process(client.java:13208) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45) Game saved for player mitch ClientHandler: Client mitch disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 192.168.1.1:4385[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 05:10:40 PM[/size][hr]any111111?

item.title: PK AREAS/Safe Zones/Runserver error/Playerlist
